title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Small Public Service Vehicle
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Small Public Service Vehicle 

(Emergency Measure Covid-19) (Fees) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited small public service vehicle (emergency measure covid-19) (fees) regulation 2021

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Taxi Regulation
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Taxi Regulation 

(Small Public Service Vehicle) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 33 of 2015).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean taxi regulation (small public service vehicle) regulation 2015 (s.i no 33 2015)

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: In these Regulations, “Covid-19” means a disease caused by infection
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations, “Covid-19” means a disease caused by infection 
with the virus SARS-CoV-2 and specified as an infectious disease in accordance 
with Regulation 6 of, and the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations 
1981 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981) or any variant of the disease so specified as an 
infectious disease in those Regulations.
text_norm: 3 regulation covid-19 mean disease caused infection virus sars-cov-2 specified infectious disease accordance regulation 6 schedule infectious disease regulation 1981 (s.i no 390 1981) variant disease specified infectious disease regulation

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the

text_raw: 4. Regulation 6 shall cease to have effect on the 30 June 2022.
text_norm: 4 regulation 6 shall cease effect 30 june 2022

text_raw:

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: 6. The Principal Regulations are amended by substitution of the following
text_raw:
6. The Principal Regulations are amended by substitution of the following 

for Schedule 1:- 

Fees 

“SCHEDULE 1
text_norm: 6 principal regulation amended substitution following schedule 1 - fee schedule 1

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: 1. The following fees shall be payable in respect of a granting of a new
text_raw:
1. The following fees shall be payable in respect of a granting of a new 
small public service vehicle licence— 

(a) €125 in respect of a wheelchair accessible taxi licence or 

wheelchair accessible hackney licence, 

(b) €1,000 in respect of a limousine licence, and 

(c) 

€50 in respect of a local area hackney licence 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [364] 3
text_norm: 1 following fee shall payable respect granting new small public service vehicle licence-- (a) eur125 respect wheelchair accessible taxi licence wheelchair accessible hackney licence (b) eur1 000 respect limousine licence (c) eur50 respect local area hackney licence notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 20th july 2021 364 3

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: 2. The following fees shall be payable in respect of the renewal of a small
text_raw:
2. The following fees shall be payable in respect of the renewal of a small 
public service vehicle licence for a period of twelve months— 

(a) €0 in respect of renewals of standard taxi licences, standard 
hackney licences or limousine licences completed prior to the 
expiry date of the prior licence, 

(b) €0 in respect of renewals of wheelchair accessible taxi 
licences, wheelchair accessible hackney licences or local 
area hackney licences completed prior to the expiry date of 
the prior licence, and 

(c) 

€0 in respect of replacement licences granted after the expiry 
date of the prior licence.
text_norm: 2 following fee shall payable respect renewal small public service vehicle licence period twelve months-- (a) eur0 respect renewal standard taxi licence standard hackney licence limousine licence completed prior expiry date prior licence (b) eur0 respect renewal wheelchair accessible taxi licence wheelchair accessible hackney licence local area hackney licence completed prior expiry date prior licence (c) eur0 respect replacement licence granted expiry date prior licence

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: 3. The following fees shall be payable in respect of the renewal of a small
text_raw:
3. The following fees shall be payable in respect of the renewal of a small 
public service vehicle licence for a period of up to six months— 

(a) €0 in respect of renewals of standard taxi licences, standard 
hackney licences or limousine licences completed prior to the 
expiry date of the prior licence, 

(b) €0 in respect of renewals of wheelchair accessible taxi 
licences, wheelchair accessible hackney licences or local 
area hackney licences completed prior to the expiry date of 
the prior licence, and 

(c) 

€0 in respect of replacement licences granted after the expiry 
date of the prior licence.
text_norm: 3 following fee shall payable respect renewal small public service vehicle licence period six months-- (a) eur0 respect renewal standard taxi licence standard hackney licence limousine licence completed prior expiry date prior licence (b) eur0 respect renewal wheelchair accessible taxi licence wheelchair accessible hackney licence local area hackney licence completed prior expiry date prior licence (c) eur0 respect replacement licence granted expiry date prior licence

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: 4. A fee of €250 shall be payable in respect of the initial grant of a small
text_raw:
4. A fee of €250 shall be payable in respect of the initial grant of a small 
public service vehicle driver’s licence.
text_norm: 4 fee eur250 shall payable respect initial grant small public service vehicle driver licence

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: 5. The following fees shall be payable in respect of the renewal of a small
text_raw:
5. The following fees shall be payable in respect of the renewal of a small 
public service vehicle driver’s licence— 

(a) €250 in respect of renewal applications submitted prior to 

the expiry date of the prior licence, 

(b) €300 in respect of renewal applications submitted within 30 

days after the expiry date of the prior licence, and 

(c) 

€400 in respect of renewal applications submitted more than 
30 days after the expiry date of the prior licence.
text_norm: 5 following fee shall payable respect renewal small public service vehicle driver licence-- (a) eur250 respect renewal application submitted prior expiry date prior licence (b) eur300 respect renewal application submitted within 30 day expiry date prior licence (c) eur400 respect renewal application submitted 30 day expiry date prior licence

renewal of a local area hackney driver’s licence.

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: 8. The Small Public Service Vehicle (Emergency Measure Covid-19)
text_raw:
8. The Small Public Service Vehicle (Emergency Measure Covid-19) 

(Fees) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 665 of 2020) are revoked. 

GIVEN under the Seal of the National Transport Authority, 

16 July 2021. 

FRED BARRY, 

Chairperson, National Transport Authority.

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of the Small Public Service Vehicle (Emergency Measure 
Covid-19) (Fees) Regulations 2021 is to temporarily amend Schedule 1 of the 
Taxi Regulation (Small Public Service Vehicle) Regulations 2015 (SI. No. 33 of 
2015), Fees. These amendments are made as exceptional provisions and 
emergency measures resultant from the Covid-19 pandemic, noting that public 
transport, specifically including small public service vehicles, is deemed by 
Government to be an essential service. The amendments of the Schedule are time 
bound, adjusting on the dates set out above. For the period to 31 December 2022, 
these Regulations waive the fees payable in respect of the renewal of a small 
public service vehicle licence completed prior to the expiry date of the prior 
licence. For the period to 30 June 2022, these Regulations waive the late renewal 
fees in respect of replacement licences granted within 12 months of the expiry 
date of the prior licence. For the period 01 July to 31 December 2022, these 
Regulations replace the late renewal fees in respect of replacement licences 
granted within 12 months of the expiry date of the prior licence with late renewal 
fees of €150 and €75. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 8 [364]
